title: Belli Acne Control Spot Treatment, .5 fl. oz.
description: Although pregnancy acne is common, thanks to fluctuating hormones, traditional acne products aren't safe for moms-to-be. That's why we like this Belli acne treatment, which is specifically formulated for pregnancy acne. It contains no salicylic acid, benzoyl peroxide, or glycolic acid (common acne ingredients which pregnant women should avoid). Its active ingredient: pregnancy-friendly colloidal sulfur, which clears blemishes and helps prevent new ones. Developed after extensive research, by a physician and beauty expert/mom. Non greasy; easy to apply. .5 fl. oz. Penetrates pores quickly. The applicator tip allows for targeted spot treatments.Contains tea tree oil (which offers antiseptic benefits) and chamomile (which soothes and soften skin)All Belli skincare products are rigorously researched to ensure they contain only pregnancy-friendly ingredients. Belli uses "teratology screening," extensively searching medical literature and databases to ensure its ingredients have never been linked to birth defects.No paraben preservatives, phthalates, dyes, and artificial fragrances. Allergy tested. Not tested on animals. Made in USA.

title: Burt's Bees Mama Bee Belly Butter, 6.5 Ounce
description: Nourish and moisturize your belly with Burt’s Bees Mama Bee Belly Butter. This 99% natural, fragrance free formula contains a combination of cocoa, shea and jojoba butters   that will keep your belly feeling soft and smooth before and after your new arrival. Simply apply this rich belly butter to your growing bump to keep skin supple. Pamper yourself with Mama Bee during your nine month stretch.
